station.leaveTrainDescription: You step off the train onto a dim underground platform in a damp concrete tunnel. Stalled escalators - now merely stairs - lead up with faded signs reading "All Terminals" assuring you that this is in fact an airport. The air is cool and moist, and the hum of still-functioning ventilation mixes with less-identifiable sounds from deeper in the dark tunnels.

field.deeperDescription: Head to the other end of the platform

general: Your footsteps echo uncomfortably in the station's muffled, saturated air.
Most of the overhead lights are out or broken, but a few still remain to bravely defy the darkness.
Faded, peeling transit maps and schedules hint at a formerly comprehensive network.
The walls are damp with moisture and little puddles collect on the tracks.
0: The strong lights of your train are comforting in the station's gloomy atmosphere.
1: Something chitters and squeaks somewhere down the tracks, deep in the darkness.
A glimmer of light reflects briefly off the eyes of some scurrying vermin past the platform's edge.
Someone has dumped a half-dozen luggage carts off the edge here. They lie broken and rusting, but at least not blocking the tracks.

tracks.description: You hop over the platform's edge and lower yourself onto the tracks.

arrivals.description: You climb up the still escalator and emerge into a wide hall. A sign proclaims it "Arrivals."

field.deeperDescription: Head towards Concourse B and parking
field.shallowerDescription: Head towards Concourse A and transit
field.exploreHereDescription: Explore the nearby baggage claims and sub-rooms

general: Luggage trolleys can be found smashed in the most improbable of ways here.
A baggage carousel lies still and silent.
An overhead sign has fallen here. You step around the broken display.
Your footsteps echo in the wide-open hall.
Piles of discarded suitcases, clothes, and useless items lie scattered around.
2: Twin escalators run up and down here; nothing more than metal staircases now.
3: An automatic security exit still functions here. You can't get back to the terminal without going upstairs.
4: A still escalator leads up a level here.
A tunnel to the parking deck yawns empty and dark.

transitCenter.description: You climb down the still escalator into the transit center.

departures.1.description: You climb up the still escalator and emerge into a wide hall. A sign proclaims it "Departures."

departures.2.description: You climb up the still escalator and emerge into a wide hall. A sign proclaims it "Departures."

parkingB.description: You pass through a short tunnel into the basement level of an echoing parking garage.

field.deeperDescription: Head towards Concourse B and parking
field.shallowerDescription: Head towards Concourse A and transit
field.exploreHereDescription: Explore the nearby kiosks and check-in counters

general: Luggage trolleys can be found smashed in the most improbable of ways here.
An automated kiosk still flickers with a semblance of life, but it doesn't respond to your presence.
An overhead sign has fallen here. You step around the broken display.
Your footsteps echo in the wide-open hall.
Piles of discarded suitcases, clothes, and useless items lie scattered around.
2: A still escalator leads down a level here.
The security line has never been faster, you suppose.
4: A still escalator leads down a level here.
The security line has never been faster, you suppose.
A walkway to the parking deck advertises its presence with plentiful signage.

encounters.text: You find a perfectly good set of pants left in a spare security bin, just lying on the floor.
You find a strange electrical device left in a spare security bin, just lying on the floor.

arrivals.1.description: You climb down the still escalator and emerge into a wide hall. A sign proclaims it "Arrivals."

arrivals.2.description: You climb down the still escalator and emerge into a wide hall. A sign proclaims it "Arrivals."

concourseA.description: You pass through the unstaffed security checkpoint and enter Concourse A.

concourseB.description: You pass through the unstaffed security checkpoint and enter Concourse B.

parking1.description: You pass through a covered walkway into the ground level of an echoing parking garage.

field.deeperDescription: Head away from the transit center

general: The air is thick with the stench of earth, mold, and decaying metal.
A small section of the tracks here is gleaming like brand new.
Uneven earth, unstable rails, and unending darkness.
Water has pooled into a dark, stagnant pond that you have to walk on the rails to cross.
Cobwebs wave in the breeze of your passing.
The dust is thick on everything. It dances in your light, making you see movement that isn't there.
A long, low groaning sound echoes through the tunnel.
0: The lights from the transit center platform grant you a sense of safety, even from here.
1: The distant lights from the transit center platform grant you a sense of safety, even from here.
4: Mounds of dirt and tumbled rock cover one set of tracks from a partial cave-in.
Clearly artificial light gleams through portions of the collapse.
6: A shiny maintenance door stands out amidst the rusted, ruined detritus surrounding it.
10: A steep staircase is visible in the tunnel wall here. Broken hinges suggest it once had a door.

transitCenter.description: You haul yourself up and clamber back onto the platform.

parkingB.description: You squirm through a partially-collapsed section of the tunnel and find yourself in the basement of a parking garage.

text: Pushing some rocks out of the way and looking upwards, you think there's a path you could follow to climb up here. It'll take some work to enlarge it, but you should be able to get through.

concourseB.description: You climb up a narrow, dark staircase and emerge into Concourse B.

text: There's an obscure staircase here that leads into Concourse B. You push open a nondescript door upstairs; you never would have noticed if not for just coming through it. Now that you know where it is, you can use it to go back down if you want.

tunnels.description: You pass through a shiny maintenance door and find yourself in narrower, human-sized service tunnels.

general: The air is thick with the stench of earth, mold, and decaying metal.
A small section of the floor here is gleaming as if it had just been cleaned.
The concrete wall has buckled here, but it still holds.
Water has pooled into a dark, stagnant pond that you have to jump across.
Cobwebs wave in the breeze of your passing.
The dust is thick on everything. It dances in your light, making you see movement that isn't there.
A long, low groaning sound echoes through the tunnel.

tracks.description: You pass through a shiny maintenance door and find yourself in wide, damp railway tunnels.

runways.description: You climb a long staircase and pop out of a small, shed-like building in the middle of the airfield.

field.exploreHereDescription: Explore the nearby spaces and vehicles

general: A soft breeze winds from above, somehow making the air feel more stagnant than if it were totally still.
Metal clatters elsewhere in the structure.
Destroyed, burnt-out car skeletons squat haphazardly in parking spaces and aisles.
A support pillar here is badly cracked and the ceiling above it sags gently.
You find more broken-down cars. Not a single vehicle here can move.
0: The tunnel to the terminal yawns empty and open here.
1: A rust-stained staircase leads up here.
4: The ground is cracked and upheaved here, forming a large sinkhole.
Several cars have fallen into the partial collapse, leaning up and down at crazy angles.
5: A rust-stained staircase leads up here.

tracks.description: You squeeze through a pile of rubble and drop into the railway tunnels.

parking1.1.description: You climb up the stairs to the ground level of the parking garage.

parking1.2.description: You climb up the stairs to the ground level of the parking garage.

arrivals.description: You pass through a short tunnel into the wide Arrivals hall.

field.exploreHereDescription: Explore the nearby spaces and vehicles

general: A soft breeze whistles through the structure, carrying a cool moisture from outside.
Metal clatters elsewhere in the structure.
Destroyed, burnt-out car skeletons squat haphazardly in parking spaces and aisles.
A support pillar here is badly cracked and the ceiling above it sags gently.
You find more broken-down cars. Not a single vehicle here can move.
0: The walkway to the terminal presents itself with excessive signage here.
1: A rust-stained staircase leads up and down here.
5: A rust-stained staircase leads up and down here.

parkingB.1.description: You climb down the stairs to the basement level of the parking garage.

parkingB.2.description: You climb down the stairs to the basement level of the parking garage.

parking2.1.description: You climb up the stairs to the second level of the parking garage.

parking2.2.description: You climb up the stairs to the second level of the parking garage.

departures.description: You pass through a covered walkway into the wide Departures hall.

field.exploreHereDescription: Explore the nearby spaces and vehicles

general: A soft breeze whistles through the structure, carrying a cool moisture from outside.
Metal clatters elsewhere in the structure.
Destroyed, burnt-out car skeletons squat haphazardly in parking spaces and aisles.
A support pillar here is badly cracked and the ceiling above it sags gently.
You find more broken-down cars. Not a single vehicle here can move.
1: A rust-stained staircase leads up and down here.
2: You can look down on the apron from here. The fence is sagging and nearly fallen.
3: You can look down on the apron from here. The fence is sagging and nearly fallen.
5: A rust-stained staircase leads up and down here.

parking1.1.description: You climb down the stairs to the ground level of the parking garage.

parking1.2.description: You climb down the stairs to the ground level of the parking garage.

apron.description: You carefully climb down the side of the parking structure and drop past the fence onto the apron. Ow.

field.deeperDescription: Head to the end of the terminal
field.shallowerDescription: Head towards the center of the airport

general: You pass by a dead, immobile travelator. It's nothing but metal floor now.
Gate seating lies upended and shuffled around here, covered in sweet-smelling residue.
A gate sign is still active, displaying information for a flight that would have departed years upon years ago.
The floors are mostly free of debris and even dusted or polished in places.
Luggage trolleys can be found smashed in the most improbable of ways here.
0: The automated security exit still slides open at your approach.
A faded sign hanging above proclaims this is the way to Concourse B.
2: Security scanner machines squat like pale, rotund toads at the ends of empty lines.
The security line has never been faster, you suppose.
5: There's a good view of the apron from here. Planes lie scattered about, most visibly damaged or burned.

departures.description: You pass back through the unstaffed security checkpoint and enter the Departures hall.

arrivals.description: You pass through a short exit hallway and return to the Arrivals hall. The one-way door shuts behind you.

concourseB.description: You walk past the shared security exit and enter Concourse B.

apron.description: You pass through a staff-only door and descend to the apron.

field.deeperDescription: Head to the end of the terminal
field.shallowerDescription: Head towards the center of the airport

general: You pass by a dead, immobile travelator. It's nothing but metal floor now.
Gate seating lies upended and shuffled around here, covered in sweet-smelling residue.
A gate sign is still active, displaying information for a flight that would have departed years upon years ago.
The floors are mostly free of debris and even dusted or polished in places.
Luggage trolleys can be found smashed in the most improbable of ways here.
0: The automated security exit still slides open at your approach.
A faded sign hanging above proclaims this is the way to Concourse A.
2: Security scanner machines squat like pale, rotund toads at the ends of empty lines.
The security line has never been faster, you suppose.
5: There's a good view of the apron from here. Planes lie scattered about, most visibly damaged or burned.

departures.description: You pass back through the unstaffed security checkpoint and enter the Departures hall.

arrivals.description: You pass through a short exit hallway and return to the Arrivals hall. The one-way door shuts behind you.

concourseA.description: You walk past the shared security exit and enter Concourse A.

apron.description: You pass through a wedged-open staff-only door and descend to the apron.

tracks.description: You climb down a narrow, dark staircase and emerge into the railway tunnels.

field.exploreHereDescription: Explore the nearby planes and debris

general: You pass between the hulks of rusted, decaying planes.
You jog for a while, just for a change of pace. You don't feel like you're going much faster.
The vast expanse of concrete feels endless.
Vegetation has broken through the concrete here, starting to reclaim this place for nature.
One foot in front of the other.
day: Heat shimmers over the apron as the sun cooks you and the planes alike.
night: Some of the airport lights still work, twinkling like tiny, ground-level stars.

concourseA.description: You pass through a staff-only door and return to Concourse A.

text: You make sure to wedge this staff-only door open so you can get back through from the other side. Thankfully, its power seems out, so the alarm won't sound.

concourseB.description: You pass through a wedged-open staff-only door and return to Concourse B.

runways.description: You walk past the edge of the airport terminal and enter the airfield proper.

field.deeperDescription: Head towards the edge of the airport grounds
field.exploreHereDescription: Explore the nearby planes and debris

general: You pass between the hulks of rusted, decaying planes.
You jog for a while, just for a change of pace. You don't feel like you're going much faster.
The vast expanses of concrete feel endless.
Vegetation has broken through the concrete here, starting to reclaim this place for nature.
One foot in front of the other.
The painted letters and markings seem so much more massive on foot than from an airplane window.
The breeze is strong out here, past the terminal's protection.
day: Heat shimmers over the taxiways as the sun cooks you and the planes alike.
night: Some of the airport lights still work, twinkling like tiny, ground-level stars.

apron.description: You walk back towards the airport terminal and enter the apron.

tunnels.description: You enter a small, shed-like building and climb down the stairs to enter the service tunnels.

text: Climbing down the stairs you find in a small, shed-like building leads you to the service tunnels. You make sure to mark the extremely generic door at the bottom so you can find your way back later.
